name: Push-ups
description: A bodyweight exercise where one starts from a prone position and repeatedly raises and lowers the body using the arms.

name: Squats
description: A strength exercise in which the trainee lowers their hips from a standing position and then stands back up.

name: Lunges
description: A strength exercise used for strengthening, sculpting and building several muscles/muscle groups including the quadriceps (thighs), the gluteus maximus (buttocks) as well as the hamstrings.

name: Plank
description: An isometric core strength exercise that involves maintaining a position similar to a push-up for the maximum possible time.

name: Bicep Curls
description: A weight-training exercise that primarily targets the biceps brachii muscle.

name: Tricep Dips
description: An upper-body strength exercise that targets the triceps and other muscles of the upper arm and shoulder.

name: Sit-ups
description: An abdominal endurance training exercise to strengthen, tighten, and tone the abdominal muscles.

name: Deadlifts
description: A weight training exercise in which a loaded barbell or bar is lifted off the ground to the level of the hips, then lowered to the ground.

name: Bench Press
description: A strength training exercise in which the trainee presses a weight upwards from a supine position.

name: Pull-ups
description: An upper body strength exercise where the exercise is performed by lifting the body up while hanging from a bar, with the arms extended.
